name: NSPopUpButton
desc: A control for selecting an item from a list.

items.name: init(frame: NSRect, pullsDown: Bool)
items.desc: Returns an NSPopUpButton object initialized to the specified dimensions.

items.name: class NSPopUpButtonCell
items.desc: The NSPopUpButtonCell class defines the visual appearance of pop-up buttons that display pop-up or pull-down menus. Pop-up menus present the user with a set of choices, much the way radio buttons do, but using much less space. Pull-down menus also provide a set of choices but present the information in a slightly different way, usually to provide a set of commands from which the user can choose.

items.name: var pullsDown: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the button displays a pull-down or pop-up menu.

items.name: var autoenablesItems: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the button enables and disables its items every time a user event occurs.

items.name: func addItem(withTitle: String)
items.desc: Adds an item with the specified title to the end of the menu.

items.name: func addItems(withTitles: [String])
items.desc: Adds multiple items to the end of the menu.

items.name: func insertItem(withTitle: String, at: Int)
items.desc: Inserts an item at the specified position in the menu.

items.name: func removeAllItems()
items.desc: Removes all items in the receiver’s item menu.

items.name: func removeItem(withTitle: String)
items.desc: Removes the item with the specified title from the menu.

items.name: func removeItem(at: Int)
items.desc: Removes the item at the specified index.

items.name: var selectedItem: NSMenuItem?
items.desc: The menu item that was last selected by the user.

items.name: var titleOfSelectedItem: String?
items.desc: The title of the item that was last selected by the user.

items.name: var indexOfSelectedItem: Int
items.desc: The index of the item that was last selected by the user.

items.name: func select(NSMenuItem?)
items.desc: Selects the specified menu item.

items.name: func selectItem(at: Int)
items.desc: Selects the item in the menu at the specified index.

items.name: func selectItem(withTag: Int) -> Bool
items.desc: Selects the menu item with the specified tag.

items.name: func selectItem(withTitle: String)
items.desc: Selects the item with the specified title.

items.name: var menu: NSMenu?
items.desc: The menu associated with the pop-up button.

items.name: var numberOfItems: Int
items.desc: The number of items in the menu.

items.name: var itemArray: [NSMenuItem]
items.desc: The array of menu item objects associated with the button.

items.name: func item(at: Int) -> NSMenuItem?
items.desc: Returns the menu item at the specified index.

items.name: func itemTitle(at: Int) -> String
items.desc: Returns the title of the item at the specified index.

items.name: var itemTitles: [String]
items.desc: An array of strings corresponding to the titles of the items in the menu.

items.name: func item(withTitle: String) -> NSMenuItem?
items.desc: Returns the menu item with the specified title.

items.name: var lastItem: NSMenuItem?
items.desc: The last item in the menu.

items.name: func index(of: NSMenuItem) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the index of the specified menu item.

items.name: func indexOfItem(withTag: Int) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the index of the menu item with the specified tag.

items.name: func indexOfItem(withTitle: String) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the index of the item with the specified title.

items.name: func indexOfItem(withRepresentedObject: Any?) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the index of the menu item that holds the specified represented object.

items.name: func indexOfItem(withTarget: Any?, andAction: Selector?) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the index of the menu item with the specified target and action.

items.name: var preferredEdge: NSRectEdge
items.desc: The edge of the button on which to display the menu when screen space is constrained.

items.name: func setTitle(String)
items.desc: Sets the string displayed in the receiver when the user isn’t pressing the mouse button.

items.name: func synchronizeTitleAndSelectedItem()
items.desc: Ensures that the item being displayed by the receiver agrees with the selected item.

items.name: class let willPopUpNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted when an NSPopUpButton object receives a mouse-down event—that is, when the user is about to select an item from the menu.
